ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Necro questions myself.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... As far as I know, necros are evil...they re KoS in Freeport and places like that -- its why there are sewer and underground routes into the major cities. I
ygData.messageBody:
--- Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:
> Is a Necro considered evil? And if so, I always see
> grouping and stuff in posts,which is why I wonder
> how
> a necro can group since who would want an evil
> char....IE: Paladin and Druid? Would they want a
> Necro
> in a group?

As far as I know, necros are evil...they're KoS in
Freeport and places like that -- its why there are
sewer and underground routes into the major cities.

I like grouping with necros because they generally
have kick-ass damage spells and a pretty nifty pet.

-Hanna

=====
